original_text:
He will be a spirit of justice
    to the one who sits in judgment,
a source of strength
    to those who turn back the battle at the gate.
korean_text: 재판석에 앉은 자에게는 판결하는 영이 되시며 성문에서 싸움을 물리치는 자에게는 힘이 되시리로다

sentences.original_text: He will be a spirit of justice
to the one who sits in judgment
to those who turn back the battle at the gate
